meanings.definition: Not situated in the center or middle.
meanings.sent1: The noncentral chair in the room was placed against the wall.
meanings.sent2: The noncentral position of the lamp made the room feel unbalanced.
meanings.sent3: The noncentral painting on the wall seemed to be hiding from the spotlight.
meanings.sent4: Her noncentral role in the play was like a supporting character in a movie.
meanings.sent5: The noncentral location of the bus stop made it hard to find in the busy city.

meanings.definition: Not of primary importance or relevance.
meanings.sent1: The noncentral details in the story were easily forgotten.
meanings.sent2: His noncentral role in the project didn't affect the outcome much.
meanings.sent3: The noncentral character in the movie provided comic relief.
meanings.sent4: Her noncentral opinion on the matter was quickly dismissed.
meanings.sent5: The noncentral ingredient in the recipe could be omitted without changing the taste.
